about_the_game:
Background Introduction

The second psychic war came to a hasty end, with its conclusion shrouded in various mysteries. But no one cares about the unsolved puzzles; they just wish for the war to end and for everything to be revitalized.
Chapter One, Article Thirteen of the "Global Coordination Charter": Artificial intelligence centers that control war machines should all be merged for planning production and regulating the world economy.
- It is forbidden for individuals or organizations to produce, use, or store artificial intelligence centers for the production or command of war machines. Existing artificial intelligence centers for related purposes should be merged by the Global Coordination Bureau for planning production and regulating the world economy.
The world has named the new artificial intelligence center "Blueprint."
Under the planning of "Blueprint," The Mega-structure Metropolis (Megapolis) of Lipsiwoz rose from the ground, becoming a new home for hundreds of millions of people — both ordinary people and psychics.

Worldview

—More than 90% of the administrative procedures pertaining to the lifecycle of psychic individuals are processed through the Administration.

The Social Mental Health Administration handles all affairs related to psychics in the city. All psychics must be managed by the Social Mental Health Administration and have a management device implanted in their cervical spine. Registered psychics must obtain approval from the Administration to use their psychic abilities. For particularly serious crimes and crimes that may involve psychics, the Psychic Inspection Department of the Social Mental Health Administration has the right and obligation to participate in the investigation.

The player will take on the role of Varnity, a newcomer to the Psychic Inspection Department, and dive into the revival era where the contradictions between ordinary people and psychics are most acute.

Gameplay and Features

    []3D top-down perspective SRPG: Command your members to fight with conventional weapons and psychic superpowers. Cultivate your favorite characters, form a distinctive 4-person team, and complete various mission objectives such as annihilating enemies, guarding bases, rescuing hostages, and obtaining intelligence. []Eavesdrop on people's hearts: Use psychic superpowers to uncover the deepest secrets of people, gather intelligence, advance the plot, and understand the interlocking worldview of this work.
  • A vast world and an ever-approaching conspiracy: A prosperous world is like an egg standing on a needle tip. Uncover the truth behind the so-called "psychic connection" and explore different possibilities for the future in the multi-branch plot. Everything depends on your choices before dawn.

Psychic Inspection Department Criminal Division - Introduction to Some Characters

Varnity: Graduated from the Psychology Department of the Third Super University of Lipsiwoz. Due to an accident, the body below the third rib was prosthetically transformed.
Ivy: A junior who recently transferred from the Social Activities Division, a strong and cheerful optimist.
Wein: A former member of the hacker organization. He often disappears from the bureau, and to find him, you can only use the psychic network.
Mackenzie: The head of the division, it is said that she served in the army during the great war and is a rare group telepath.

Walking in the Megapolis Lipsiwoz, understand the life state of people in the fictional world which is almost like "Brave New World", and find your own way to break the deadlock.

Plot Experience

The script is personally in charge of the producer.
In the creative process, we strive to obtain opinions from professors in the fields of sociology and economics and seek professional theoretical guidance from science fiction magazine editors.
The production team has prepared hundreds of thousands of words of complete settings, striving to depict a rigorously set and realistically detailed psychic society science fiction world.
We also welcome fans to create works under the same worldview with us!

Audio Experience

Full process dubbing, sound effects and music are all newly created, striving to bring players a completely immersive gaming experience.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains some adult content elements:
Bloodshed, violent acts, accidental deaths, physical injuries, corpses, depictions of violence, weapon imagery, derogatory language, criminal acts, suicide, partial nudity, and depictions of illegal drug use.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 12100f or equal
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 or equal
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

short_description: An anime-styled social sci-fi SRPG game. As an inspector, navigate through the Megapolis where material production has reached its zenith, and confront the unending conflict between psychics and ordinary citizens. Only by shattering all the rules of this beautiful new world can you achieve rebirth.
